Authors: Arbi Siti R.H.M., Bismo A., Sutiyo L.
Title: Segmentation analysis of Instagram Users Based on Preferences towards Forms and Types of Online Marketing Content
Source title: Proceedings of 2019 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2019
Affiliations: International Marketing Program, BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Arbi Siti, R.H.M., International Marketing Program, BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bismo, A., International Marketing Program, BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sutiyo, L., International Marketing Program, BINUS Business School Undergraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Along with increasing usage of social media especially Instagram, Instagram can be used as a tool to promote a business and build relationship with the customer. One of marketing strategy that can be done on Instagram is to create a content marketing but before that it is important to companies or online shop to know their segment and preferences of content to achieve effective results. So the purpose of this research was to determine Instagram users' segmentation and their preferences of content marketing. Methods of data collection used in this research are cluster analysis and cross tab analysis. The results of this study showed there are three segments on beauty category, two segments on each fashions and phone accessories category. Every segments their preferences towards online marketing content. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: consumer preference; content marketing; instagram; segmentation
Index Keywords: Cluster analysis; Electronic commerce; Image segmentation; Information management; Consumer preferences; Content marketings; instagram; Marketing strategy; Methods of data collections; Online marketing; Segmentation analysis; Social media; Marketing
